At the end of your turn IF you made an attack, gain 1m ELSE remove 3m OR gain 1r.

Systems.name: Shadow Diarchy
Systems.description:
Stability: 4

Action: IF in revolution, remove 1r.

Boon grants 0 / +1 to a force, when in revolution it grants +2 / 0 instead.

Ignore the condition “Played on an enemy”.

When in revolution, attacks have +1 / 0. You are only defeated if you are still in revolution at the end of your next turn.

none

Systems.name: New World Order
Systems.description:
Stability: 7

A force with your boon may make an attack immediately after you attack with another card. When a card with your boon is captured or destroyed, add 1r to your leadership.

The first time you play a military force or place on your turn, you may play a non-event occult-type.
Systems.source:
New World Order - n/a - MO
system
none


Stability: 7
A force with your boon may make an attack immediately after you attack with another card. When a card with your boon is captured or destroyed, add 1r to your leadership.
The first time you play a military force or place on your turn, you may play a non-event occult-type.

Systems.name: Democracy
Systems.description:
Stability: 5

Your boon makes any card it is attached to feel slightly freer.

When in revolution, give up! You’ve already lost.

Whenever you would use an action, you must first vote on it. If you achieve a simple majority, the action is performed on your next turn. If you achieve 2/3 majority, you may perform the action immediately.
Systems.source:
Democracy - n/a - N
system
none


Stability: 5
Your boon makes any card it is attached to feel slightly freer.
When in revolution, give up! You’ve already lost.
Whenever you would use an action, you must first vote on it. If you achieve a simple majority, the action is performed on your next turn. If you achieve 2/3 majority, you may perform the action immediately.
